name: penpot
description: Penpot is an open-source design and prototyping platform for product teams. It features real-time collaboration, vector editing, and design systems all within a self-hosted UI that can scale across teams.
features: Vector design tools: Professional vector editing with pen tool, shapes, boolean operations, and path manipulation for precise design work
Real-time collaboration: Multiple designers work simultaneously on same file with live cursors and instant synchronization
Prototyping features: Create interactive prototypes with transitions, animations, and clickable hotspots to demonstrate user flows
Design systems: Build and maintain component libraries with shared styles, colors, and typography for consistent design language
Developer handoff: Export CSS, inspect measurements, and generate code snippets to streamline designer-developer collaboration
Version history: Track design changes over time and restore previous versions when needed for iteration and experimentation
Team management: Organize users into teams with role-based permissions to control access to projects and resources
SVG export: Export designs as clean SVG code with optimization options for web and application use
Plugin support: Extend functionality with plugins for additional tools, integrations, and workflow enhancements
Open standards: Based on web standards and open formats ensuring long-term accessibility and interoperability
